name: Jumpy (Sayuri1)
description:
Help white Jumpy and her little friend dark Jump reach the portal.

...

Move with A-S-D, jump with W. Hold W to jump higher.

Press R to restart the current level if there is a bug.

...

I made this game for Global Game Jam. Hope all jamers had a great time. Don't hesitate to go hard in the comments so I can improve myself even more.

...

Made by: @Sayuri elgunalp1@gmail.com

Github link for spaghetti code

SFX: The Ultimate 2017 16 bit Mini pack by @phoenix1291

Completion Sound by @Brandon Morris

Font: Minecraft by @Craftron Gaming

Made with Defold engine using Lua, thanks to everyone in Defold forums.
